apple_vendor_description: This delightful emoji on Apple devices captures the essence of a loving couple, featuring a woman with a medium-dark skin tone and a partner without a specified skin tone, all embraced by a radiant heart. Apple's design imbues the heart with a soft glow and glossy finish, symbolizing deep affection and unity, while the figures are rendered with smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges for a gentle, approachable look. The realistic lighting enhances the emotional warmth, making this emoji a beautiful way to express partnership, love, and strong emotional bonds.
